RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui doutorado em Dottorato di Ricerca in Fisica - Universit degli Studi di Salerno (2008). Tem experincia na rea de Fsica, com nfase em Fsica Clssica e Fsica Quntica; Mecnica e Campos
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
PERSONAL profile
Physicist, Geophysicist and Programmer. With extensive experience in research, university-level teaching and scientific programming. Expert in the development of numerical and computational methods in Geophysics and Physics, using different programming languages and operating systems.
SELECTED COMPUTER & SCIENTIFIC SKILLS
ANSI C, C++ , FORTRAN 77/90 UNIX & UNIX-like OS: Solaris (SUN Microsystems), Ubuntu Linux, UNIX shells and shell scripting: bash, Bourne shell, c-shell Python 2.7, Python 3.3 Mathematical and symbolic manipulation software: Mathematica, Maple, MATLAB LATEX2E Document Markup Language, other typographic tools MS Windows XP / Windows 7, MS-DOS. MS Office, Sun Microsystems OpenOffice HTML, PHP, Javascript, Joomla!, MS Access, MySQL MS Visual Basic, MS Visual C++, Code::Blocks Quantum mechanics, quantum optics and quantum computation Numerical methods. Specialized in optimization/inversion, wave propagation, and tomography
Education
Ph.D. Physics (2008): Universit degli Studi di Salerno, Baronissi (SA), Italy. With full scholarship by the Italian Foreign Ministry, Direction of Cultural Promotion, DGPC. Danish Ministry of Science, Innovation and Higher Education: The qualification is comparable in level to a Danish PhD degree Thesis: CONTINUOUS VARIABLE TELEPORTATION WITH NON-GAUSSIAN RESOURCES IN THE CHARACTERISTIC FUNCTION REPRESENTATION Selected Topics and Skills: Mathematica and MATLAB symbolic manipulation languages, Stochastic and Statistical Methods, Theoretical Quantum Optics, Quantum Information Theory, Quantum Decoherence, Quantum Communication and Teleportation, Solid State Physics, Renormalization Group, Research Methods.
M.Sc. Physics (2001): Universidad Simn Bolvar, Caracas.Venezuela. With academic assistant responsibilities in the Earth Sciences (1997-99) and Physics Departments (1999-2000) of the Universidad Simn Bolvar. Danish Ministry of Science, Innovation and Higher Education: The qualification is comparable to a Danish Master's degree within the field of Natural Science Thesis: ESTADOS DE NUMERO COMPRIMIDOS (Squeezed Fock States) Selected Topics and Skills: MAPLE V symbolic manipulation language, Mathematical Foundations of Quantum Mechanics and Quantum Optics, Theoretical Quantum Optics, Classical Electrodynamics, Quantum Electrodynamics, Quantum Field Theory, Statistical Mechanics, Special Relativity, Algebraic Topology.
B.Sc. Geophysical Engineering (1996): Universidad Simn Bolvar, Caracas, Venezuela. Danish Ministry of Science, Innovation and Higher Education: The qualification is comparable in level to a Danish Bachelor's degree as well as 1 year of a Danish Master's degree Geophysics Thesis: INVERSION TOMOGRAFICA A LO LARGO DE ZONAS DE FRESNEL (Tomographic Traveltime Optimization Along Fresnel Zones), in collaboration with INTEVEP s (Research Centre of Petrleos de Venezuela S.A.(PDVSA)) Earth Sciences Department Selected Topics and Skills: C language, FORTRAN /77, Unix Shell Scripting (C-Shell, Bourne Shell), Finite Differences, Wave Equation Solution and Propagation, Numerical and Statistical Methods for Problem Inversion/Optimization, Mathematical Methods of Classical Physics, Tomographic Inversion Methods, Scientific Computing, Structural and Sedimentary Geology, Petroleum Geology, Signal Analysis, Wave Propagation, Seismology, Potential Methods, Seismic Surveying, Analysis and Interpretation of Geophysical Data.

DOUTORADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: CONTINUOUS VARIABLE TELEPORTATION WITH NON-GAUSSIAN RESOURCES IN THE CHARACTERISTIC FUNCTION REPRESENTATION

AREA-DE-ATUACAO.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Fsica Clssica e Fsica Quntica; Mecnica e Campos

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: On the squeezed number states and their phase space representations

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Journal of Optics. B, Quantum and Semiclassical Optics (Print)

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Continuous-variable quantum teleportation with non-Gaussian resources
